alert.note: Alert for Blount; Fayette; Jefferson; Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:09AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Walker, southern Blount, north central Jefferson, southeastern Winston and central Fayette Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 208 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Smith Dam to Fayette. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Oneonta, Fayette, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Carbon Hill, Cleveland, Arley, Dallas, Warrior, Kimberly, Locust Fork, Berry, Parrish, Oakman, Trafford, Allgood, Fairview and Hayden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
